ygData.subject: Re: resistance after patch
ygData.msgSnippet: me too! i got 25 at the aviaks, ran to permafrost to meet 2 other people. i got killed twice, once right after getting my corpse the first time, buy trains
ygData.messageBody:
me too! i got 25 at the aviaks, ran to permafrost to meet 2 other people. i
got killed twice, once right after getting my corpse the first time, buy
trains that ran by me and expressly came back to get ME (ignoring the
cleric and monk in my party). i lost a bubble and the level, but luckily
the exp is good there and i got it back quick...

i still think SOMETHING got jacked from the patch...

Qorona Mindbender of the Volition Guild, 25th lvl enchanter on Cazic-Thule

>I had a lot of trouble too. Blue things were resisting and EVERYTHING
>seemed to be coming after me. In a group of 5 players I was the sole
>target of interest. Two big ugly deaths after the patch.
>

-------------------
tim borrelli
computer character animator and crackhead extraordinaire
Volition, Inc.
timmyland@...
http://www.timmyland.com
